des.main: Created a VR site with 3DoF that shows the Solar System on a real-time video background captured by the camera using HTML, JS and AFHTML.

This Virtual Reality (VR) experience allows you to explore the Solar System within a real-time video background captured by your camera. Using 3 Degrees of Freedom (3DoF) head tracking, you can look around and navigate the virtual planets while keeping your surroundings visible in the background.
sub: HTML: Provides the structure for the webpage.
JavaScript: Enables interactivity and manipulation of the 3D scene.
A-Frame HTML (AFrame): A web framework for building VR experiences with HTML components.

des.main: Features:
sub: Real-time Background: The camera captures your surroundings and displays them as the background of the VR scene, creating a unique blend of virtual and real environments.
3DoF Head Tracking: By moving your head, you can control your viewpoint within the Solar System, allowing you to explore different planets and celestial bodies.
Solar System Objects: The planets, moons, and other objects of the Solar System are represented in 3D models, providing a realistic and immersive experience.
Scalability: The VR scene can be scaled to fit the size of your physical space, ensuring a comfortable viewing experience.

des.main: Benefits:
sub: Engaging Learning Tool: This VR experience can be a fun and interactive way to learn about the Solar System, its planets, and their relative positions.
Immersive Exploration: Users can feel like they are truly traveling through space, fostering a sense of wonder and curiosity about the universe.
Blended Reality: The real-time video background adds a layer of familiarity and connection to the virtual world, making the experience more engaging.

des.main: Streamline your WhatsApp communication:
sub: Take control of your WhatsApp with our automation tool. Respond to messages instantly, categorize chats, send targeted broadcasts, and collaborate with your team - all from one platform.

des.main: Boost your productivity and customer satisfaction:
sub: Free yourself from repetitive tasks and focus on what matters. Our WhatsApp automation tool helps you deliver faster responses, improve customer experience, and grow your business.

des.main: ERPNext is a powerful open-source ERP (Enterprise Resource Planning) system designed to simplify and centralize your business operations. It offers a comprehensive suite of tools that cater to various departments and functionalities within your organization.:
sub: Unified Platform: Manage all your core business processes - accounting, sales, inventory, CRM, manufacturing, projects, and more - in one integrated system. Eliminate data silos and ensure seamless information flow across departments.

Real-time Visibility: Gain instant insights into your business performance with real-time dashboards and reports. Track inventory levels, monitor sales pipelines, and make informed decisions based on accurate data.

Increased Productivity: Automate routine tasks and workflows, freeing up your team to focus on strategic initiatives. Streamline processes like order fulfillment, invoice generation, and expense management.

Enhanced Customer Relationship Management (CRM): Build stronger relationships with your customers by managing leads, opportunities, and service requests effectively. Track interactions, automate communications, and personalize your sales approach.
Improved Inventory Management: Gain complete control over your inventory levels. Track stock movements, set reorder points, and optimize purchasing decisions to avoid stockouts and overstocking.
Simplified Project Management: Plan, track, and manage projects with ease. Collaborate with team members, assign tasks, monitor progress, and stay within budget and deadlines.

Cost-Effective Solution: ERPNext is a free and open-source software, eliminating hefty licensing fees. You can customize it to fit your specific business needs and scale effortlessly as your company grows.
